name: PONGO!!!
description:
A local multiplayer game that mixes pong and super smash bros! Make your sphere hit your opponent to send it off screen. The more damage you have, the further you will be launched when hit so be careful! You can also hold your boost button to hit your sphere with more power or dodge your enemy.

Controls:

  • Wasd/Arrow keys - move
  • G/Space - boost
  • Esc - Pause

Feel free to send feedback here or on my Twitter. Made with Godot Engine.

Credits

Music:

  • "Bossa Pause Menu" by Joth
  • "Battle Theme" by Ville Nousiainen

Sound Effects:

  • Iwan Gabovitch (qubodup) (https://opengameart.org/users/qubodup) 
  • Unnamed (https://opengameart.org/users/unnamed)
  • Lamoot (https://opengameart.org/users/lamoot)
